content: **crocheted jacket in drops daisy the piece is worked top down with raglan sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern da-024 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops daisy from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 500-550-600-650-750-850 g colour 13 almond **buttons** drops buttons no 515 6 items in all sizes **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 4 mm **crochet gauge** 18 treble crochets in width and 9 row in height on hook size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
